artist: Artist: Joel Janowitz; Printer: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis; Publisher: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis
creditline: Highpoint Editions Archive, The Friends of Bruce B. Dayton Acquisition Fund and the Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: Six-color bleed print lithograph printed split-fount from three plates on kitakata paper. The artist made additions in watercolor and bee's wax was applied over all. The print was then adhered to the Arches Cover backing sheet.
image_copyright: Copyright © Joel Janowitz%2C published by Highpoint Editions
markings: LL in pencil below image: ARCHIVE 1/2 | Publisher\'s blindstamp, LL below image: HP
medium: Color lithograph, watercolor additions, and bee’s wax, with chine collé
provenance: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis (publisher); sold to MIA, 2020.
signed: LR in pencil below image: Janowitz 2005 | BC in pencil below image: VERTICAL DIPTYCH
title: Vertical Diptych
